rows.label: qst002701_msg0001
rows.name: Ugh! Curse those Idle Rodonya!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm so close to completing this
concoction! I won't allow them
to get in the way!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0003
rows.name:
Huh? What do you want?
In case you couldn't tell, I'm busy here.
I don't have time to be dealing with...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh? You wouldn't happen
to be a Driver, would you?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, why didn't you say so
in the first place?!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0006
rows.name:
Listen, I happen to have just
the job for you.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0007
rows.name:
It's not a particularly difficult job, and
I promise I'll reward you handsomely!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0008
rows.name:
So what do you say?
Will you do it?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0009
rows.name:
...Oh, all right, I suppose you deserve
a tad more explanation than that.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0010
rows.name:
The thing is, I'm working on a certain
medicinal concoction. It's top secret.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0011
rows.name:
If I manage to complete it, I should be
able to help people across the world!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0012
rows.name:
But just as my research is nearing
its end, I've run into a little snag.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0013
rows.name:
A bunch of Idle Rodonya have
settled down in the only place I can
procure a key herbal ingredient!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0014
rows.name:
So I was wondering if you could
clear them out for me. Simple
enough, right?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0015
rows.name:
It's for the sake of the greater good!
You know you want to do it.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0016
rows.name:
Thanks! You're a beacon of
shining hope for us all!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0017
rows.name: (...Heheh, some people are so gullible.)

rows.label: qst002701_msg0018
rows.name:
What?! I didn't say anything!
Anyway, about where to find those
pesky Idle Rodonya...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0019
rows.name:
They reside somewhere in the
Argan Iceblooms.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm counting on you to do this.
For me, and for the whole world!
(Heheh...)

rows.label: qst002701_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, hello again!
Did you defeat those Idle Rodonya
for me already?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0102
rows.name: What? You didn't?

rows.label: qst002701_msg0103
rows.name:
I told you, you can find them in the
Argan Iceblooms. Quick!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0104
rows.name:
Don't forget, the whole world
is counting on you!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh, my! You really did defeat
them all! I knew turning to you
was the right decision.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0202
rows.name:
Yes, now my concoction should be
complete in no time! Yes...finally...

rows.label: qst002701_msg0203
rows.name:
Ahah... Ahahah...
Ahahahahahahahahahahah!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0204
rows.name:
Oh, I've been waiting for this
moment for so long. You have no idea
of the struggles I've been through!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0205
rows.name:
But now! My life's work! Is complete!
I will finally be united with my darling!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0206
rows.name:
The flames of passion I have
harbored so long will finally
be rewarded!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0207
rows.name: I think we have questions.

rows.label: qst002701_msg0208
rows.name: Ask if helping the world was all a lie

rows.label: qst002701_msg0209
rows.name: Ask what this medicinal concoction is

rows.label: qst002701_msg0210
rows.name:
Oh, no. I would never lie about
such a wondrous creation!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0211
rows.name:
Once I mass-produce this concoction,
people across the world will no longer
have to suffer unrequited love!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0212
rows.name:
With the help of this miracle potion,
their feelings will be reciprocated!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0213
rows.name:
And of course, that includes me.
My beloved will finally be mine!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0214
rows.name:
Very well! As thanks for all your help,
I will tell you its name!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0215
rows.name:
The concoction I have been researching
is a powerful brew that will fill any who
drink it with pure romantic passion!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0216
rows.name: I call it...the Love Potion!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0217
rows.name:
And I will be the first to use it
to claim my beloved's heart!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0218
rows.name:
I really couldn't have done it
without you, you know!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0219
rows.name:
Here's your reward, as promised.
I hope you're pleased with yourselves!

rows.label: qst002701_msg0220
rows.name:
Thank you again, my cupids of love!
I'll let you know once all my dreams
come true! Ahaha!
